Description: Rim and wall sherd of North Ionian pottery plate; cream slip; stopt maeander between lines on top of rim; band with added red band lined in white at edge of floor; to the inside, metopal frieze of alternating red and black tongues and rosette, part in red, lined in dilute; band to the centre with added white; frieze of rectangles between lines on outside of rim, underside glazed; four bands and two lines preserved on exterior wall.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GI.001)
